name: COVID19ICD10PCSValueSetForHemodialysis
title: COVID19 ICD10PCS Value Set for Hemodialysis
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to hemodialysis and is listed as a renal disorder on the CDC SARS-CoV-2 hospitalization surveillance case report form.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes hemodialysis procedures.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes peritoneal dialysis.)

concept.display: Performance of Urinary Filtration, Intermittent, Less than 6 Hours Per Day
Performance of Urinary Filtration, Prolonged Intermittent, 6-18 hours Per Day
Performance of Urinary Filtration, Continuous, Greater than 18 hours Per Day

contains.display: Performance of Urinary Filtration, Intermittent, Less than 6 Hours Per Day
Performance of Urinary Filtration, Prolonged Intermittent, 6-18 hours Per Day
Performance of Urinary Filtration, Continuous, Greater than 18 hours Per Day
